portal is a game where you have a portal gun and you portal the gun to a portal while the portal you fired goes on to a wall (but get this) you first need to understand the lore to figure out how to place portals on walls. so there's this guy right (the dude from spiderman) and he makes a company that sells shower curtains (they get wet) and after enough time he starts doing science stuff and he makes a gun that makes portals on stuff but not any stuff only stuff found on the place in transformers the dark side of the moon. and you know what they say, the world is taken over by these guys called the combine, and then gordon freeman swoops in and saves the day (not too sure) but after like 300 fortnite seasons, chell wakes up in chicago and this british guy wants her to move (he likes to take other peoples property) after a while they fight goku but goku goes ultra instinct and he wins and sends them into the pit. when chell wakes up, she is in the daily bugle with j jonah jameson and he is soooooo cool (but the green goblin attacks him and spiderman comes in to save the day. after j jonah jameson dies, you go back up and fight goku again, but this time chell outsmarts goku and shoots a portal on the moon and goku is sent through it and dies. the end.

The Portal series is now one of, if not my favorite games I've played to date. Portal 1 is significantly shorter, but both are still very easy to pick up and put down. I got them for a combined $3 USD during a sale, but honestly, despite having one of the worst price/hour ratios in my library at full price (about $1.75/hour), it is worth every cent, even without a sale. Like I've heard many times, One of the worst things about Portal is that you can never play it for the first time again, and I'd have to agree. These games are 100x better if you don't know anything about them. I'm almost positive they wouldn't be my favorite if I knew more than I did, and even then, it was a bit more than I wish I knew.

TL;DR: The Portal series is phenomenal and can be obtained for much less than base price, but are worth every penny of full retail. Also go in as blind as possible.

Whilst portal does introduce really interesting and fun mechanics on the surface, it does not really do anything fun with them and half of the game seemed to be just the same "momentum shenanigans"  or strict time based scenarios copy-pasted between rooms. Overall, whilst it is a pretty good game, it is completely eclipsed in quality by portal 2 in my opinion

被IGN年度评分第二（第一塞尔达）的portal2吸引而来，2代玩了一半，但是G姐和小机器人的可爱形象精致巧妙的关卡设计已经深入我心。今天通关第一代后狠狠的爱上了这款有剧情，有内涵的解谜游戏  关卡难度不高，可偶尔卡关半小时也是有可能的（会突然茅塞顿开发现自己是个笨蛋233）通关结尾致谢G姐唱的 still alive真的好感动 ，一路上的情感，经历汇入其中， 升华主题  总体来说是乌托邦式不可多得的好游戏  ，喜欢！V社yyds!
